DMA_HWAttrs_t Struct Reference
DMA Driver External Data Structures

DMA H/W Parameters. More...

#include <drivers/dma/dma.h>

Data Fields

volatile uint32_t ctrlBaseAddr

Detailed Description

DMA H/W Parameters.

DMA parameters are used with the DMA_open() call.

Field Documentation

volatile uint32_t DMA_HWAttrs_t::ctrlBaseAddr

DMA Peripheral's base address for the control register space

uint32_t DMA_HWAttrs_t::defaultPortAssignment

Default Port assignment for all the channels

uint32_t DMA_HWAttrs_t::intNum[DMA_IntType_NUM]

DMA Peripheral's interrupt vector for each interrupt type

uint32_t DMA_HWAttrs_t::numDmaChannels

Number of DMA channels in this instance

uint32_t DMA_HWAttrs_t::numReqLines

Number of DMA request lines in this instance

volatile uint32_t DMA_HWAttrs_t::pktBaseAddr

DMA Peripheral's base address for the control packet (RAM) space
